nav.div: Yukon Public Schools » Family & Students » Coronavirus (COVID-19) Information and Resources

div.div: District Remote Operations / Sites Closed Yukon Public Schools has transitioned to remote operations and distance learning as directed by the State of Oklahoma and State Department of Education for the remainder of the academic school year. For more information regarding remote operations and answers to frequently asked questions, please choose from one of these resources:

div.noscript: You need javascript enabled to view this content or go to source URL.
